short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weather Extension in React(using typescript and material ui.)!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple weather extension used for displaying the weather of a place. The extension comes with a toggle overlay feature also. Its built using React, Typescript and material UI>
